static_page.title: Disclosures Required for Internet & Remote Contracts for Ontario residents and for Distance Sales Contracts for BC Residents
static_page.page_data:
Disclosures Required for Internet & Remote Contracts for Ontario residents and for Distance Sales Contracts for BC Residents

  1. The supplier of the vacation package is Marriott Ownership Resorts, Inc. d/b/a Marriott Vacation Club International ("MVCI").
  2. MVCI's main business office is located at 6649 Westwood Blvd., Orlando, Fl 32821 (although you are not required to deal with MVCI at this location) and an MVCI representative can be reached at:
    1. telephone number: 800-782-5410
    2. facsimile number: 407-903-6330
    3. email: MVCI Guest Care@vacationclub.com
  3. The offer made is for a 5 day 4 night vacation package ("Package") in a guest room at Marriott's Grande Vista in Orlando, FL; includes a $100 Marriott Gift Card. This package must be purchased by December 31, 2013 and travel must be completed 12 months from the time of purchase.
  4. The prices for the Packages available are US$349 for travel between March 1, 2013 and April 18, 2013 (the "First Travel Period"), US$249 for travel between April 19, 2013 and December 14, 2013 (the "Second Travel Period"), US$349 for travel between December 15, 2013 and April 17, 2014 (the "Third Travel Period"), US$249 for travel between April 18, 2014 and December 13, 2014 (the "Fourth Travel Period"); these prices are inclusive of taxes. All options require a deposit in the amount of US$199 which can be paid with a major credit card (Visa, MasterCard, Discover, or American Express).
  5. A US$99 Holiday Surcharge may apply for select holiday date periods¹. Room upgrades range from US$149 to US$249 and additional nights range from US$99 to US$249 per night. Upgrades and additional nights are based upon availability. There is a US$99 cancellation fee if reserved dates are cancelled within 30 days of arrival.
  6. The total prices for the purchase of the Package are US$349 for the First and Third Travel Periods and US$249 for the Second and Fourth Travel Periods; these amounts are paid with a US$199 deposit at the time of purchase with the balance paid in full at the time of travel. This amount is payable in USD only.
  7. Payment for the Package can be made by credit card (Visa, Mastercard, Discover, or American Express).
  8. The Package can be used to travel for 12 months from the date of purchase of the Package, is based on inventory availability, and travel dates are reserved on a first-come first-serve basis. It is recommended that you book your dates a minimum of 90 days in advance.
  9. Eligibility for purchase of the package requires your attendance at a 90 minute sale presentation during your stay for the Marriott Vacation Club Destinations timeshare club.
  10. You may cancel a contract for the purchase of a Package without penalty or obligation within (i) seven (7) days for residents of Ontario or (ii) ten (10) days for residents of British Columbia, from the date you receive a copy of the thank you/confirmation letter by email or regular post. If you decide to cancel the contract, you must notify MVCI at the telephone or facsimile number provided above.
  11. The Package program is available to couples or individuals with an annual income of US$100,000 or more (or its currency equivalent). Employees of Marriott Vacations Worldwide Corporation and its affiliated companies, their immediate families and current Owners of Marriott Vacation Club International interests are ineligible for this offer. If married or living together, couples must attend a sales presentation together to receive this offer; individuals may purchase separately. Failure to attend sales presentation can result in the charge of full retail value of the Package. The presentation time and date will be confirmed prior to arrival. A major credit card is required at check-in. Holiday travel is subject to availability. Airfare, transportation, additional expenses and other applicable taxes, if any, are not included with this offer. This offer is not valid in conjunction with any other promotional offer. This offer is nontransferable, and the purchase price is nonrefundable. One offer per family or household; no groups. This offer is subject to change without notice. Cancellation of reservation, reschedules within 30 days of arrival, and presentation no-shows will forfeit the Package and the purchase price.

Please contact MVCI pursuant to (ii) above to correct any errors in your information that we may have.

¹
Holiday Arrival Dates
Easter 3/29/15 - 4/4/15
Memorial Day 5/20/15 - 5/24/15
Independence Day 7/1/15 - 7/4/15
Labor Day 9/2/15 - 9/6/15
Thanksgiving 11/25/15 - 11/28/15
Christmas/New Year's 12/21/15 - 1/1/16
President's Day 2/10/16-2/14/16
Easter/Spring Break 3/20/16 – 4/1/16
Memorial Day 5/25/16 – 5/29/16
Independence Day 6/29/16 – 7/4/16
Labor Day 8/31/16 – 9/4/16
Thanksgiving 11/20/16 – 11/26/16
Christmas/New Year's 12/20/16 - 1/1/17

static_page.page_data:
Disclosures Required for Internet & Remote Contracts for Ontario residents and for Distance Sales Contracts for BC Residents

  1. The supplier of the vacation package is Marriott Ownership Resorts, Inc. d/b/a Marriott Vacation Club International ("MVCI").
  2. MVCI's main business office is located at 6649 Westwood Blvd., Orlando, Fl 32821 (although you are not required to deal with MVCI at this location) and an MVCI representative can be reached at:
    1. telephone number: 844-896-3036
    2. facsimile number: 407-903-6330
    3. email: MVCIGuestCare@vacationclub.com
  3. The offer made is for a 4 day 3 night vacation package in a one bedroom villa at Marriott's Grande Vista ("Package").
  4. The price for the Package available is US$299 for arrivals 12/15 to 4/8 or US$199 for arrivals 4/9 to 12/16; this price is inclusive of taxes. A deposit of $199.00 is required and must be paid at the time of initial purchase. The balance must be paid in full at the time of reservation and all funds must be paid with a major credit card (Visa, MasterCard, Discover, or American Express). The amount is payable in US dollars only.
  5. A US$99 holiday surcharge may apply for select holiday date periods¹. Additional nights range from US$149 to US$299 per night. Additional nights are based within a year after the date of purchase upon availability.
  6. Travel must be completed within 6 months after the date of purchase, is based on inventory availability, and travel dates are reserved on a first-come first-serve basis. It is recommended that you book your dates a minimum of 90 days in advance.
  7. Eligibility for purchase of the Package requires your attendance at a 90 minute sales presentation about the Marriott Vacation Club Destinations timeshare club, during your stay.
  8. You may cancel a contract for the purchase of a Package without penalty or obligation within (i) seven (7) days for residents of Ontario or (ii) ten (10) days for residents of British Columbia, from the date you receive a copy of the thank you/confirmation letter by email or regular post. If you decide to cancel the contract, you must notify MVCI at the telephone or facsimile number provided above.
  9. The Package program is available to couples or individuals with an annual income of US$100,000 or more (or its currency equivalent). Employees of Marriott Vacations Worldwide Corporation and its affiliated companies and their immediate families are ineligible for this offer. If married or living together, couples must attend a 90 minute sales presentation together to receive this offer; individuals may purchase separately. This offer cannot be combined with any other offer and cannot be used in conjunction with current Marriott Vacation Club Ownership. Failure to attend the sales presentation can result in the charge of full retail value of the Package. Full retail value of the Package is $191 per night. The presentation time and date will be confirmed prior to arrival. A major credit card is required at check-in. Holiday travel is subject to availability. Airfare, transportation, additional expenses and other applicable taxes, if any, are not included with this offer. Changes and cancellations to any reservation must be made within 60 days of arrival date to avoid a $99.00 cancellation fee. This offer is not valid in conjunction with any other promotional offer. This offer is nontransferable, and the purchase price is not refundable after ten days from the date you receive a copy of the thank you/confirmation letter by email or regular post. One offer per family or household; no groups. This offer is subject to change without notice. Cancellation of reservation, reschedules within 30 days of arrival date, and presentation no-shows will forfeit the Package and the purchase price.

1 Holiday dates are based upon availability and the Holiday Surcharge is a one-time fee of US$99.00.

static_page.page_data:
Disclosures Required for Internet & Remote Contracts for Ontario residents and for Distance Sales Contracts for BC Residents

  1. The supplier of the vacation package is Marriott Ownership Resorts, Inc. d/b/a Marriott Vacation Club International ("MVCI").
  2. MVCI's main business office is located at 6649 Westwood Blvd., Orlando, Fl 32821 (although you are not required to deal with MVCI at this location) and an MVCI representative can be reached at:
    1. telephone number: 844-896-3036
    2. facsimile number: 407-903-6330
    3. email: MVCIGuestCare@vacationclub.com
  3. The offer made is for a 6 day 5 night vacation packagein a Ko Olina guest room ("Package").
  4. The price for the Package available is US$799; this price is inclusive of taxes. A deposit of $199.00 is required and must be paid at the time of initial purchase. The balance must be paid in full at the time of reservation and all funds must be paid with a major credit card (Visa, MasterCard, Discover, or American Express). The amount is payable in US dollars only.
  5. A US$99 holiday surcharge may apply for select holiday date periods¹. Additional nights range from US$149 to US$299 per night. Additional nights are based within a year after the date of purchase upon availability.
  6. Travel must be completed within a year after the date of purchase, is based on inventory availability, and travel dates are reserved on a first-come first-serve basis. It is recommended that you book your dates a minimum of 90 days in advance.
  7. Eligibility for purchase of the Package requires your attendance at a 90 minute sales presentation about the Marriott Vacation Club Destinations timeshare club, during your stay.
  8. You may cancel a contract for the purchase of a Package without penalty or obligation within (i) seven (7) days for residents of Ontario or (ii) ten (10) days for residents of British Columbia, from the date you receive a copy of the thank you/confirmation letter by email or regular post. If you decide to cancel the contract, you must notify MVCI at the telephone or facsimile number provided above.
  9. The Package program is available to couples or individuals with an annual income of US$100,000 or more (or its currency equivalent). Employees of Marriott Vacations Worldwide Corporation and its affiliated companies and their immediate families are ineligible for this offer. If married or living together, couples must attend a 90 minute sales presentation together to receive this offer; individuals may purchase separately. This offer cannot be combined with any other offer and cannot be used in conjunction with current Marriott Vacation Club Ownership. Failure to attend the sales presentation can result in the charge of full retail value of the Package. Full retail value of the Package is $473 per night. The presentation time and date will be confirmed prior to arrival. A major credit card is required at check-in. Holiday travel is subject to availability. Airfare, transportation, additional expenses and other applicable taxes, if any, are not included with this offer. Changes and cancellations to any reservation must be made within 60 days of arrival date to avoid a $99.00 cancellation fee. This offer is not valid in conjunction with any other promotional offer. This offer is nontransferable, and the purchase price is not refundable after ten days from the date you receive a copy of the thank you/confirmation letter by email or regular post. One offer per family or household; no groups. This offer is subject to change without notice. Cancellation of reservation, reschedules within 30 days of arrival date, and presentation no-shows will forfeit the Package and the purchase price.

1 Holiday dates are based upon availability and the Holiday Surcharge is a one-time fee of US$99.00.

static_page.page_data:
Disclosures Required for Internet & Remote Contracts for Ontario residents and for Distance Sales Contracts for BC Residents

  1. The supplier of the vacation package is Marriott Ownership Resorts, Inc. d/b/a Marriott Vacation Club International ("MVCI").
  2. MVCI's main business office is located at 6649 Westwood Blvd., Orlando, Fl 32821 (although you are not required to deal with MVCI at this location) and an MVCI representative can be reached at:
    1. telephone number: 800-782-5410
    2. facsimile number: 407-903-6330
    3. email: MVCI Guest Care@vacationclub.com
  3. The offer made is for a 6 day 5 night vacation package ("Package") in a Kauai Beach Club guestroom.
  4. The price for the Package available is US$749; this price is inclusive of taxes. A deposit in the amount of US$199 is required, which can be paid with a major credit card (Visa, MasterCard, Discover, or American Express).
  5. A US$99 Holiday Surcharge may apply for select holiday date periods¹. Additional nights range from US$149 to US$299 per night. Additional nights are based upon availability. There is a US$99 cancellation fee if reserved dates are cancelled within 30 days of arrival.
  6. The total price for the purchase of the Package is US$749; this amount is paid with a US$199 deposit at the time of purchase. This amount is payable in USD only.
  7. Payment for the Package can be made by credit card (Visa, Mastercard, Discover, or American Express).
  8. The Package can be used to travel for twelve months after purchase date, is based on inventory availability, and travel dates are reserved on a first-come first-serve basis. It is recommended that you book your dates a minimum of 90 days in advance.
  9. Eligibility for purchase of the package requires your attendance at a 90 minute sales presentation during your stay about the Marriott Vacation Club Destinations timeshare club.
  10. You may cancel a contract for the purchase of a Package without penalty or obligation within (i) seven (7) days for residents of Ontario or (ii) ten (10) days for residents of British Columbia, from the date you receive a copy of the thank you/confirmation letter by email or regular post. If you decide to cancel the contract, you must notify MVCI at the telephone or facsimile number provided above.
  11. The Package program is available to couples or individuals with an annual income of US$100,000 or more (or its currency equivalent). Employees of Marriott Vacations Worldwide Corporation and its affiliated companies and their immediate families are ineligible for this offer. If married or living together, couples must attend a sales presentation together to receive this offer; individuals may purchase separately. Failure to attend sales presentation can result in the charge of full retail value of the Package. The presentation time and date will be confirmed prior to arrival. A major credit card is required at check-in. Holiday travel is subject to availability. Airfare, transportation, additional expenses and other applicable taxes, if any, are not included with this offer. This offer is not valid in conjunction with any other promotional offer. This offer is nontransferable, and the purchase price is nonrefundable. One offer per family or household; no groups. This offer is subject to change without notice. Cancellation of reservation reschedules within 30 days of arrival, and presentation no-shows will forfeit the Package and the purchase price.

  1. The supplier of the vacation package is Marriott Ownership Resorts, Inc. d/b/a Marriott Vacation Club International ("MVCI").
  2. MVCI's main business office is located at 6649 Westwood Blvd., Orlando, Fl 32821 (although you are not required to deal with MVCI at this location) and an MVCI representative can be reached at:
    1. telephone number: 844-896-3036
    2. facsimile number: 407-903-6330
    3. email: MVCIGuestCare@vacationclub.com
  3. The offer made is for a 4 day 3 night vacation package in a 2 bedroom villa at Marriott's Ocean Watch Villas. Plus, receive a $50 Marriott Gift Card ("Package").
  4. The price for the Package available is US$299 (Must Travel 10/1 - 3/23) this price is inclusive of taxes. A deposit of $199.00 is required and must be paid at the time of initial purchase. The balance must be paid in full at the time of reservation and all funds must be paid with a major credit card (Visa, MasterCard, Discover, or American Express). The amount is payable in US dollars only.
  5. A US$99 holiday surcharge may apply for select holiday date periods. Additional nights range from US$149 to US$299 per night. Additional nights are based within a year after the date of purchase upon availability.
  6. Travel must be completed within a year after the date of purchase, is based on inventory availability, and travel dates are reserved on a first-come first-serve basis. It is recommended that you book your dates a minimum of 90 days in advance.
  7. Eligibility for purchase of the Package requires your attendance at a 90 minute sales presentation about the Marriott Vacation Club Destinations timeshare club, during your stay.
  8. You may cancel a contract for the purchase of a Package without penalty or obligation within (i) seven (7) days for residents of Ontario or (ii) ten (10) days for residents of British Columbia, from the date you receive a copy of the thank you/confirmation letter by email or regular post. If you decide to cancel the contract, you must notify MVCI at the telephone or facsimile number provided above.
  9. The Package program is available to couples or individuals with an annual income of US$100,000 or more (or its currency equivalent). Employees of Marriott Vacations Worldwide Corporation and its affiliated companies and their immediate families are ineligible for this offer. If married or living together, couples must attend a 90 minute sales presentation together to receive this offer; individuals may purchase separately. This offer cannot be combined with any other offer and cannot be used in conjunction with current Marriott Vacation Club Ownership. Failure to attend the sales presentation can result in the charge of full retail value of the Package. Full retail value of the Package is $659 per night. Airfare, transportation, additional expenses and other applicable taxes, if any, are not included with this offer. Changes and cancellations to any reservation must be made within 60 days of arrival date to avoid a $99.00 cancellation fee. This offer is not valid in conjunction with any other promotional offer. This offer is nontransferable, and the purchase price is not refundable after ten days from the date you receive a copy of the thank you/confirmation letter by email or regular post. One offer per family or household; no groups. This offer is subject to change without notice. Cancellation of reservation, reschedules within 30 days of arrival date, and presentation no-shows will forfeit the Package and the purchase price.
